line1.text: They traversed the jungle through the night, yet their fatigue had not deterred them from their quest.

line2.text: Emily: From Dad's archives and mappings, it looks as if the temple descends deep into the Earth.

line4.text: Roy: If Dad found it, then so can we.  We have to... for his sake.

line6.text: Jake: See, Tank knows we'll find Dad!

line1.text: Roy trekked up the cracked stairs to the Temple's entrance as Emily, Jake, and Tank lagged behind.

line3.text: Before Roy could act,  the temple had devoured his family.  All Roy could do was stare into the dark abyss.

line4.text: Roy: Emily?!!  Jake?!!  I'll save you!

line5.text: With only a moment's hesitation, Roy leaped into the abyss.
